title: 03/01/22 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 03/01/22 DPS Best Of
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show. DP further discusses the Kyler Murray situation. Did anyone come out a winner after his agent's statement yesterday? Pro Football Talk's Mike Florio shares why he's confident we haven't seen the last of Tom Brady on an NFL field. And The Athletic's Bill Oram tells us whether he thinks LeBron will finish his career with the Lakers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
